title: Oru Pere Varalaaru Lyrics Translation - Jana Nayagan
stanzas:
Oru Pere Varalaaru
Alichaalum Aliyaadhu
Avandhaaney Jananayagan
Namma Makkal Nadaikkaama Oru Maatram Porakaadhu
Thara Vandhaan Tharamaanavan

A single name is history
It cannot be erased even if destroyed
He is the leader of the people
Without our people taking a step, a change won't be born
The man of quality has arrived to give it

Un Pere Keatta Udhal Oramje Pogum
Vizhi Thirayil Paarthal Manam Karamje Pogum
Nee Thoona Ninnaa Oru Iname Vaazhum
Nee Dhooram Ponna Enga Uyire Pogum

Just hearing your name, a smile spreads across the lips
If seen on the screen, the heart melts away
If you stand as a pillar, a race will survive
If you go far away, our life departs

Unakke Oru Yudham Iniyae
Uyire Udhal Ratham Thuliye
Varuven Oru Pakkam Thunaiye
Uyirin Uyire
Azhiyadha Varalaatre Kadhaye
Mudiyadha Nam Ratham Karaye
Kalathil Ivan Irukkum Varaye
Irukkum Bayame

A war is for you from now on
Life is but a drop of blood in the body
I will come by your side as support
The soul of our souls
An unerasable story of history
The endless stain of our blood
As long as he is in the field
Fear will remain (for others)

Ivan Veri Orungaadhe
Ivan Kodi Erangadhae
Ivan Mudi Vanangaadhe
Puyal Thalai Koradhe
Mukkaalathil Evarum Oru Inai Kidayaadhe
Ivan Pugazh Azhiyaadhe
Singam Iraiyagadhe

His fire will not subside
His flag will not come down
His head will not bow
The storm will not touch his hair
In all three eras, there is no equal to him
His fame will not perish
The lion will not become prey

Kodi Maalaigal Neeyum Enga Pona Pogum
Pogum Vazhiye Enga Vizhiye
Oru Mazhaya Therikkum
Thandra Sandhosham
Naanga Nandri Sollum Neram
Engal Maname Unna Dhiname Enga Kanava Sumakko

Wherever you go, millions of garlands follow
Wherever you go, our eyes follow
The happiness you gave
Splashes like a rain
It is time for us to say thanks
Our hearts carry you as our dream every day

Oru Pere Varalaaru
Oru Pere Varalaaru
Alichaalum Aliyaadhu
Avandhaaney Jananayagan
Oru Yugame Kaanadha Makkal Mannan Porandhaaru
Tamil Mannin Tharamaanavan

A single name is history
A single name is history
It cannot be erased even if destroyed
He is the leader of the people
The king of the people, unseen for an era, is born
The man of quality of the Tamil soil
